bookmarks.title: Daniele's Website
bookmarks.description: A pretty site about retro and the old web. There's games, a music player, a CRT simulator! There's also a lot of Kurby cuteness.

bookmarks.title: OpenBooks
bookmarks.description: One of the oldest and active web portals and projects on NeoCities and one of the main reasons I joined NeoCities in the first place!
